bibl.title: Inside Roman Libraries: Book Collections and Their Management in Antiquity

series.title: Studies in the History of Greece and Rome.

bibl.note: 1. Assembling a Collection. - 2. Lists of Books Preserved on Papyrus. - 3. The Villa of the Papyri at Herculaneum. - 4. The Book Collections of Oxyrhynchus. - 5. Spaces, Storage, Equipment, and Art. - 6. Personnel and Their Activities. - Conclusion. - Pp. 265-279: Appendix 1. Lists of Books on Papyrus: Greek Texts, English Translations, and Commentary; - 280-286: Appendix 2. Checklist of Books in the Collection of the Villa of the Papyri; - 287-296: Appendix 3. Catalog of Manuscripts in the Breccia + GH3 Find. - Bibliography. Index of Ancient Sources. General Index.
bibl.seg: George W. Houston, Inside Roman Libraries: Book Collections and Their Management in Antiquity = Studies in the History of Greece and Rome.
Chapel Hill, University of North Carolina Press, 2014, 8Â°, xvi-327 pp., tabl., 13 figg. ISBN 978-1-4696-1780-0. $59.95.

1. Assembling a Collection. - 2. Lists of Books Preserved on Papyrus. - 3. The Villa of the Papyri at Herculaneum. - 4. The Book Collections of Oxyrhynchus. - 5. Spaces, Storage, Equipment, and Art. - 6. Personnel and Their Activities. - Conclusion. - Pp. 265-279: Appendix 1. Lists of Books on Papyrus: Greek Texts, English Translations, and Commentary; - 280-286: Appendix 2. Checklist of Books in the Collection of the Villa of the Papyri; - 287-296: Appendix 3. Catalog of Manuscripts in the Breccia + GH3 Find. - Bibliography. Index of Ancient Sources. General Index.

C.R. par Scott G. Bruce, BMCRev < http://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2015/2015-04-56.html >. - Timothy Mitchell, Eleutheria 4 (2015) 1, pp. 52-54 < http://digitalcommons.liberty.edu/eleu/vol4/iss1/5 >. - Jean-Louis Charlet, Latomus 75 (2016) pp. 800-801. - Matthew C. Nicholls, JRS 106 (2016) pp. 334-335.
